name: The Gatherer
credits:
Rita-Bernstein - Character art, ZHS translation
Jedi - RUS translation
HuginRonin - SPA translation
MappyTheKat - Old character splash art
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character with 75 cards, 7 relics.

v1.0.8 (2022-10-23)
- New localization: Spanish(Thanks to HuginRonin)
- Now the border of following cards will glow if their additional effect will be activated: Drug Power, Finishing Strike, Polymorphism
- Explorer's Path pick ratio data was updated for the Gatherer and the Poker Player. Added pick ratio data for the Dragon Tamer.

Visit https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/1611788501 for full change notes.
